TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Draki, title = Draki, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draki} }

S.FORM: Draki Itiniay i Mudan Cen no Pingtung ko Draki a niyaro', 250 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 618 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 594 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 24 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Bunun 0.5%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Draki Itiniay i Modan Cen no Pingtong ko Draki a niyaro', 250 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 618 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 594 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 24 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan 95%, Bonon 0.5%, roma 0.5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
